settings.content: We don‚Äôt sell just dog beds. We spread Health and Happiness to our pawesome Dogs by improving their sleeping experience!

settings.title: Why Choose Dogslanding
settings.content:
We are focused to create comfy products engineered to improve Health and Happiness of your fur kids!

We are dog lovers inspired by Dogs! This is why we are:
settings.button_note: Let's Get to Know Each Other

settings.title: Our Comfy Products features
settings.content:
We design our products from our italy offices, with our worldwide customers‚Äô needs in mind, then we source the highest quality materials.

The result is a product:
Sonny, our little Jack Russell from Italy, thanks to his sleeping habits, was our main inspiration to create comfy dog beds that look great in any room, while maintaining healthy features.

That‚Äôs our motto! After a lot of studies, we found that dogs on average sleep 12-14 hours a DAY. This is why we focus on the importance of our dogs‚Äô sleeping experience, we need to improve it to give them an Healthy and Happy life! üêï ‚ù§Ô∏è

Here is me, Samuele, the Founder, and Sonny the C.E.O. and inspirator of Dogslanding‚Ñ¢.

At the start, the real reason of Dogslanding Existence was to create comfy and healthy dog beds for Sonny because he loves to sleep a lot!

Then we found that a lot of dog owners were loving our job and we decided to spread comfiness all over the world.

Every product is tested and enjoyed from Sonny first üí§.

If he loves it and our team accepts the design, we send our new products to our ambassadors to let them test with their different dogs.

That is what Dogslanding‚Ñ¢ is all about, Health and Happiness thanks to Comfy product. üê∂ ‚ù§Ô∏è

Inspired by Dogs, created by Dog Owners for Dogs.

Best,

settings.title: It starts with an idea‚Ä¶
settings.content: We watch, listen and create with an understanding of what dogs (and their humans) need.

settings.title: Where are you based?
settings.content:
Our main office is based in Italy, where we design our products!

Our partner factory is based in Asia, where we source the best materials, and currentl we are working to partner up with a USA warehouse to handle our logistic.

settings.title: What are the shipping times?
settings.content:
Please visit our shipping information page¬†HERE¬†

IMPORTANT: We are not responsible if a package is undeliverable because of missing, incomplete, or incorrect destination information. We do our best to avoid errors by verifying the shipping information with every customer in the order confirmation sent immediately after purchase.

settings.title: Do you ship internationally?
settings.content: Yes, we currently ship worldwide. If you have any questions or you can't seem to ship to your region, please reach out to us and we'll try¬†to¬†resolve.

settings.title: Do you provide a tracking number?
settings.content: Yes, you will receive an email once your order ships that contain your tracking information. If you haven‚Äôt received tracking info within¬†7 days, please¬†contact us below.

settings.title: How long does it take for an order to arrive?
settings.content:
All items in store take 1-2 business days to process.¬†Be sure to add¬†processing time to your¬†shipping time estimates.

Your product has been shipped once you receive your shipping confirmation email. The majority of our customers have received their items around the 1-3 week¬†(7-10 days on average) mark where customs aren't as long, examples include USA/UK. For a full list of shipping estimates please see our¬†shipping page.

settings.title: I ordered 2+ items, but only received one... where's my order?
settings.content:
To offer free worldwide shipping, since our products are pretty big, usually we ship them in different packages.

If you received only 1 item, don't worry, we'll support you until you receive what you paid for! ¬†

settings.title: I no longer want my order, can I cancel and refund?
settings.content:
We do a have a refund policy in place on damaged/missing goods. We don't provide cancelations if the shipping email has already been sent.¬†Once the item(s) have been shipped we no longer have control of them, hence we would lose the shipping costs plus items.

In the unlikely event that your order hasn't arrived within 3-5 weeks (due to lost mail, etc.) please contact us and we help resolve. Refunds & returns will not be processed after 30 days (from delivering). Thanks for understanding!

See¬†our Full Return/Exchange/Refund Policy

Every case is different, just reach out to us and we'll be happy to help.
